refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sorts an array by key, maintaining key to data correlations. This is useful mainly for associative arrays.

example.title: ksort example
example.screen: a = orange b = banana c = apple d = lemon

refsect1.para: You may modify the behavior of the sort using the optional parameter sort_flags, for details see sort.
refsect1.simpara: See also asort, arsort, krsort, uksort, sort, natsort, and rsort.

note.para: The second parameter was added in PHP 4.
